name: Veggie Omelette
description: Gluten, Soy, nut, egg, dairy free
recipeIngredient: a generous pinch of black salt/kala namak (1/8 teaspoon)
a generous pinch of garlic powder (1/8 teaspoon)
a few Tablespoons each of chopped onion (bell peppers, tomato, carrots( 1/3 to 1/2 cup total veggies))
1/2  Jalapeno or serano chili pepper finely chopped (or use black pepper/cayenne to taste)
1/4 cup packed chopped spinach or greens

recipeInstructions.text: In a bowl, add flaxmeal and warm 1/4 cup water.
recipeInstructions.name: In a bowl, add flaxmeal and warm 1/4 cup water.

recipeInstructions.text: whisk and let sit for 5 minutes. Prep the veggies.
recipeInstructions.name: whisk and let sit for 5 minutes. Prep the veggies.

recipeInstructions.text: Mix baking powder in the chickpea flour.
recipeInstructions.name: Mix baking powder in the chickpea flour.

recipeInstructions.text: Add in the chickpea flour, oat flour, salt, spices and 1/4 cup more water and mix. and whisk for half a minute to combine well and to help the batter get airy.
recipeInstructions.name: Add in the chickpea flour, oat flour, salt, spices and 1/4 cup more water and mix. and whisk for half a minute to combine well and to help the batter get airy.

recipeInstructions.text: (Or use garfava(garbanzo and fava bean flour), instead of flax,oat, chickpea. Mix in baking powder in garfava flour and add water. garfava makes a thicker mixture and a fatter fluffier omelette. you might need additional water if the batter is too thick)
recipeInstructions.name: (Or use garfava(garbanzo and fava bean flour), instead of flax,oat, chickpea. Mix in baking powder in garfava flour and add water. garfava makes a thicker mixture and a fatter fluffier omelette. you might need additional water if the batter is too thick)

recipeInstructions.text: Add the veggies, jalapeno, greens and fold in well.
recipeInstructions.name: Add the veggies, jalapeno, greens and fold in well.

recipeInstructions.text: Heat a non stick pan at medium heat and grease a little.
recipeInstructions.name: Heat a non stick pan at medium heat and grease a little.

recipeInstructions.text: Drop the batter on the hot pan and tap once or twice to spread. (Or use spatula to spread the veggies a bit)
recipeInstructions.name: Drop the batter on the hot pan and tap once or twice to spread. (Or use spatula to spread the veggies a bit)

recipeInstructions.text: Cover with a lid and cook for 7 minutes.
recipeInstructions.name: Cover with a lid and cook for 7 minutes.

recipeInstructions.text: Take lid off, add a few drops of oil on the edges, cook for another 5-7 minutes(depends on the consistency of the batter).
recipeInstructions.name: Take lid off, add a few drops of oil on the edges, cook for another 5-7 minutes(depends on the consistency of the batter).

recipeInstructions.text: Add more greens and/or non dairy cheese, fold and serve with ketchup, toasts and hash browns.
recipeInstructions.name: Add more greens and/or non dairy cheese, fold and serve with ketchup, toasts and hash browns.

keywords: easy recipe, no egg omelette, vegan omelette
